DOC.brief_summary: The aim study estimate diagnostic accuracy combine biomarker test ( include NMDA-Receptor fragment [ NR2-peptide ] Glial fibrillary acidic protein ) use differentiate cerebral ischemia intracerebral hemorrhage patient acute hemispheric stroke .
DOC.criteria: hemiparesis least one sign cortical involvement ( e.g. , aphasia , neglect , gaze deviation , reduce level consciousness ) hospital admission within 4.5 hour symptom onset stroke/TIA within last 3 month traumatic brain injury within last 3 month history brain tumor
